title: Endless spinner on recovery
body:
# Problem

Endless spinner on recovery account

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28752642/63851900-c692c000-c99f-11e9-8a0a-aceb1cea08c1.png)


## Steps

1. open status
2. recover known account with pass phrase
